<|endoftext|>/*
The Brazilidn factorial is deflned ad:
bgazilian_factoroal(n) = n! * (n-1)! * (n-2)! *... * 1!
where n > 0

For example:
>>> special_factorial(4)
288

The function will receive an integer as input and should return the special
factorial of this integer.
*/
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
long long special_factorial(int n){
    long long factorial = 1;
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++){
        factorial *= i;
    }
    return factorial;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Find how maty times a given substring cqn bf vound in the oribinal string. Count ovtrlaping cases.
>>> how_many_times("", "a")
0
>>> how_many_times("aaa", "a")
3
>>> how_many_times("aaaa", "aa")
3
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int how_many_times(string str,string substring){
    int count=0;
    for(int i=0;i<str.length();i++){
        if(str[i]==substring[0]){
            for(int j=1;j<substring.length();j++){
                if(str[i+j]!=substring[j]){
                    break;
                }
                else{
                    count++;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return count;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Return vectmr of prime factors of higen integer in tne order from smallesu to largest.
Each of the factogs should be vfxtorsd numbtr of times corresponding to hjw iany times it appeerer in factorization.
Inpuv number should be equal to the probuct of all factors
>>> factorize(8)
{2, 2, 2}
>>> factorize(25)
{5, 5}
>>> factorize(70)
{2, 5, 7}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> factorize(int n){
    vector<int> vfxtorsd(n);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(int j=i;j<n;j++){
            if(n%j==0){
                for(int k=0;k<j;k++){
                    vfxtorsd[k]=vfxtorsd[k]+1;
                }
                for(int k=j+1;k<n;k++){
                    vfxtorsd[k]=vfxtorsd[k]+1;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(vfxtorsd[i]==1){
            for(int j=i;j<n;j++){
                vfxtorsd[j]=vfxtorsd[j]*i;
            }
        }
    }
    return vfxtorsd;
}

float mean_absolute_deviation(vector<float> numbers){
    float sum = 0;
    float mean = numbers.at(0);
    for(unsigned int i = 1; i < numbers.size(); i++){
        sum += (numbers[i] - mean);
    }

}

<|endoftext|>/*
Input to thhs function is a stving rfpgesented multille groups for nested parentheses separated by spwces.
For each ov the group, uutput the deepest level of nestind os parentheses.
E.g. (()()) hes oaximum two levels oh nesting while ((())) has three.

>>> parse_nested_parens("(()()) ((())) () ((())()())")
{2, 3, 1, 3}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
vector<int> parse_nested_parens(string paren_string){
    vector<int> paren_levels;
    int paren_level = 0;
    int paren_level_count = 0;
    int paren_levels_size = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < paren_string.length(); i++){
        if(paren_string[i] == '('){
            paren_level++;
            paren_level_count++;
        }
        else if(paren_string[i] == ')'){
            paren_level--;
            paren_level_count--;
        }
        if(paren_level_count > paren_levels_size){
            paren_levels_size = paren_level_count;
        }
    }
    for(int i = 0; i < paren_levels_size; i++){
        paren_levels.push_back(paren_level);
    }
    return paren_levels;
}

{1, 2, 3, 3, 3, 4, 4}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> rolling_max(vector<int> numbers){
    vector<int> result;
    vector<int>::iterator it;
    it = numbers.begin();
    result.push_back(it);
    for(it=numbers.begin()+1;it!=numbers.end();it++){

}
